text: 2.3 Jon 17.12, 1 Ti 4.1, 1 Jo 2.18, 4.3, Lep 13.11-14 Nɨbi nɨgtep gem, nɨbop yepɨs ma agenɨgel. Mel yɨbɨl. Ñɨn awl anɨb ak ownɨg gaknɨŋ, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl kɨli ned God nop kelɨgɨl, monmon gɨnɨgabal. Anɨb gɨlaknɨŋ, bɨ tɨmel God takaw tɨbɨlɨkep ak mɨseŋ lɨl anɨb gɨnɨgab. Bɨ anɨb ak kɨdek mab ke yɨneb amnɨgab.
